id.description: Canonical user id to grant for. Used only when `type` is `CanonicalUser`.

permissions.description: List of permissions to apply for grantee. Valid values are `READ`, `WRITE`, `READ_ACP`, `WRITE_ACP`, `FULL_CONTROL`.

type.description: Type of grantee to apply for. Valid values are `CanonicalUser` and `Group`. `AmazonCustomerByEmail` is not supported.

uri.description: Uri address to grant for. Used only when `type` is `Group`.
